import React, { useState } from "react"; import './Calculadora.css' import Container from '@mui/material/Container'; import Box from '@mui/material/Box'; export default function Calculadora(){ const [num, setNum] = useState(0) function ChangeNum(e){ const input = e.target.value setNum(input) } const somar = ()=> { const result = num + num return result } return (

{num}
) }
